name: In the curse of Inner world
name_original: In the curse of Inner world
description:
In the curse of Inner world is a text game with three different endings.

You want to run away, from your heart, no, from your mind.

You need to do something unthinkable...

But will you reach the final ending?

You will get more [keyword] in-game, try to put in words in [],

like [look], [walk]

EX: when you need [combine] stuff, put [olddata] first...
